Title: Relates to requiring the department of labor to provide information to employers about shared work program eligibility and benefits
Summary: Creates a requirement for the department of labor to annually provide information to employers about shared work program eligibility with such information to be made available on the department's website and to conduct outreach to employers to provide information about benefits of shared work programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring the department of labor to provide information to employers about shared work program eligibility and benefits
